Website Development and IT Solution

Internships

Summer Internship

Self-Assessment:

Determine your career interests and areas of IT you want to explore. Identify the skills you need to develop or strengthen.

Skill Development:

Take relevant courses or certifications in areas like programming, data science, cybersecurity, etc. Work on personal or open-source projects to build your portfolio. Participate in coding challenges and hackathons.

Resume and LinkedIn Profile:

Create a professional resume highlighting your skills, projects, and educational background. Update your LinkedIn profile to reflect your resume and include a professional photo.

Networking:

Connect with professionals in the industry through LinkedIn, university alumni networks, and career fairs. Attend IT-related events, webinars, and meetups.
